Package core.dc

Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com DC Module contains utils to compress and decompress info

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CatchAlgorithm<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com do translate on bytes to tokens Each CatchAlgorithm can only translate a single token
    DCAlgorithm<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com Class : Version : Usage :
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitArray
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com BitArray: a container to store and retrieve bit WARNING: use UnjoinableBitArray instead if you don't want to use append function
    BlockDCM<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com BlockDCM: the DCM split files into blocks and do dc on each block concurrently WARNING: this module is not fully tested and have serious problems
    CatchASCIIAlgorithm
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com do translate on bytes to tokens Catch as ASCII codes
    CatchFixedBitsAlgorithm
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com do translate on bytes to tokens Translate fixed size bits into a token WARNING: this algorithm is not fully tested and have serious problems
    CatchFixedBytesAlgorithm
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com do translate on bytes to tokens Catch fixed bytes as token WARNING: this ca algorithm have serious running speed problem, and in must case is not necessary to use
    DCASCIIFactory
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The factory based on ASCII tokens
    DCFactory<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com Factory to manage a set of dc, ca, dcm
    DCFixedBitsFactory
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The factory base on the FixedBitsTokens
    DCFixedBytesFactory
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The factory used by fixed bytes algorithm
    DCHuffmanAlgorithm<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com The huffman tree DC algorithm
    DCM<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com DCM is the tool to manage dc and ca and do real compress and decompress
    DCRaw<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com Raw dc: get something and just put it back
    SequentialBlockDCM<T extends core.dc.Token>
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com Like BlockDCM, but without using threads
    SequentialThreadingPool
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com a threading pool that can manage job to do sequential works WARNING: this module is not fully tested and have serious problems
    SequentialThreadingPool.ThreadingSequentialTask
    the threading task to put into sequential threading pool
    UnjoinableBitArray
    Copyright : all rights reserved,rapidhere@gmail.com Mail: rapidhere@gmail.com the effective version of BitArray

Package core.dc Description
